item.title: Note on OpenWRT
item.description: Obtain OpenWRT Find the device model at the Table of Hardware (Huawei HG556a C) Open Device Techdata for Firmware OpenWrt Install URL Open Device Page for Installation instructions Computer - Cable - Router Connect the computer to the router with a cable. Install OpenWRT Follow the instructions to install OpenWRT. SSH First login: telnet 192.168.1.1 Change password to enable SSH: passwd exit For public key authentication, add the public key:
